docs.title: Helpful
docs.text:
It may be helpful to install the Inject Jyutping extension. Depending on the type of browser you're using, you may use the appropriate extension to see the Jyutping on the text.

  • Chrome Web Store
  • Firefox Browser Add-On

docs.title: Description
docs.text: I'm pretty much just putting dialogs from episodes or other notes.

docs.title: Note Blocks
docs.text:
You may add note blocks via

::: underbrace
我 | I
叫 | called
做 | (emphasis)
:::

which will be rendered as

docs.title: Tools Used
docs.text: For this repository, I'm using MkDocs to render the information in the Markdown files. I'm using the Material theme.

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text:
Peppa: 我叫做Peppa

::: underbrace 我 | I 叫 | called 做 | (emphasis) :::

::: underbrace 叫做 | "He/She is called..." :::

This portion is Peppa introducing herself but providing an emphasis as if it was 3rd person. Or as if she was braking the 4th wall

Peppa: 而佢就係我細佬George

::: underbrace 而 | a more formal version of 同 佢 就係 | "just is" 我 細佬 | colloquial version of younger brother George :::

Peppa: 佢就係豬太太

::: underbrace 佢就係 豬 | pig 太太 | Mrs. :::

Peppa: 佢係豬先生

::: underbrace 佢係豬 先生 | Mr. :::

Peppa: 我係Peppa

docs.title: Episode
docs.text:
Narrator: 因為今日落雨, 所以Peppa同George唔可以出去玩啊

::: underbrace 因為 | because 今日 | today 落雨 | rain (v) (落 | fall 雨) | rain :::

::: underbrace 所以 | therefore Peppa 同 | and George 唔可以 | can't 出去 | go out 玩 | play 啊 | (end particle) :::

Peppa: 爹哋，外面停雨喇

::: underbrace 爹哋, | Daddy 外面 | outside 停雨 | stop raining (停 | stop 雨) | rain 喇 | (end particle) :::

Peppa: 我哋可唔可以出去玩啊？

::: underbrace 我哋 | We 可唔可以 | can/cannot 玩啊？ :::

Dad: 噉好啦，你哋出去玩啦

::: underbrace 噉好啦 | Well, (噉 | very 好 | good 啦) | (end particle) 你哋 出去 玩啦 :::

Narrator: Peppa好鍾意跳落啲泥氹度㗎

::: underbrace Peppa 好 | really 鍾意 | like 跳落 | jump into (跳 | jump 落) | downward 啲 | (pl. classifier) 泥氹 | puddle 度 | (location) 㗎 :::

Peppa: 我好鍾意泥氹㗎

Mom: Peppa！

Mom: 你要跳落泥氹嘅話, 就要着咗水鞋先得㗎

::: underbrace 你 要 | want 跳落 泥氹 嘅話 | If you want :::

::: underbrace 就要 | then you have to 着 | wear 咗 | ? 水鞋 | rain boot 先得 | do it first 㗎 :::

Peppa: 對唔住啊

::: underbrace 對唔住 | Sorry 啊 :::

Comes from 对不起 which comes from "I can't compare to you"

::: underbrace 隊冧佢 | take care of him (kill him) (隊 | poke 冧 | collapse 佢) :::

Narrator: George都好鍾意跳落啲泥氹度㗎

::: underbrace George 都 | also 好鍾意 | really likes 跳落啲泥氹度㗎 :::

Peppa: George啊！如果你要跳落泥氹度, 就一定要着水鞋㗎

::: underbrace George啊！ 如果 | if 你要跳落泥氹度 :::

::: underbrace 就 | then 一定 | must (定) | constraint 要着水鞋㗎 :::

Narrator: Peppa好鍾意照顧佢細佬George

::: underbrace Peppa 好鍾意 照顧 | take care 佢 細佬 George :::

Peppa: George，我哋再去揾多啲泥氹吖

::: underbrace George, 我哋 再 | repeat 去 | go 揾 | search for 多啲 | more of 泥氹 吖 :::

Narrator: Peppa同George玩得好開心啊

::: underbrace :::

Narrator: Peppa揾到個好細嘅泥氹

::: underbrace :::

Narrator: 而George就揾到個大泥氹

::: underbrace :::

Peppa: George，睇下 Peppa: 嗰邊有個好大嘅泥氹啊 Narrator: George好想第一個跳入大泥氹度喎 Peppa: 等陣啊，George Peppa: 我要幫你試下係咪安全先啊 Peppa: 好嘢，呢度安全喇 Peppa: 對唔住啊，不過係泥嚟㗎咋 Narrator: Peppa同George真係好鍾意跳落泥氹度玩㗎 Peppa: 快啲嚟啦，George Peppa: 我哋而家要去畀嚟爹哋睇下啊 Dad: 你哋唔係𠻺嘛？ Peppa: 爹哋…你估下我哋做過啲咩嚟吖 Dad: 等我估下先 Dad: 你哋頭先去咗睇電視？ Peppa: 唔係啊，爹哋 Dad: 你哋啱啱沖完涼？ Peppa: 唔係 Dad: 噉我知喇，你哋頭先跳咗落泥氹度 Peppa: 冇錯啊，爹哋 Peppa: 我哋頭先跳咗落泥氹度啊 Dad: 睇下你兩個幾污糟吖 Dad: 唔緊要啦，係泥嚟啫 Dad: 喺媽咪睇到之前，快啲抹乾淨佢 Peppa: 爹哋，抹乾淨之後 Peppa: 你同媽咪會唔會同我哋一齊玩㗎？ Dad: 會啊，我哋可以喺花園一齊玩 Narrator: Peppa同George着咗水鞋 Narrator: 豬太太同豬先生亦着咗水鞋 Narrator: Peppa鍾意喺泥氹度跳上跳落 Narrator: 大家都好鍾意喺泥氹度跳上跳落 Mom: 哎吔，爹哋啊，睇下你而家幾污糟吖 Peppa: 都只係泥嚟啫
